channel.title: Homepage on Wise Analytica
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Wise Analytica

item.title: Aru Bhardwaj
item.description: Aru is the founder of Wise Analytica. Started his career as a data science consultant in 2019, since then he is working with clients across the globe. He is experienced crafting machine learning solutions for different sectors including management consulting firms, marketing agencies, real estate firms and healthcare institutions. He believe that the most important trait in a data scientist is not how well one implements the algorithms and models but translating a real-life problem that can be solved using that analysis.

item.title: Natural Language Processing
item.description: Natural language processing is inreasingly becoming a dominant solution across different industries. Objectives Financial accounting and financial reporting are often used as synonyms. According to International Financial Reporting Standards: the objective of financial reporting is: To provide financial information that is useful to existing and potential investors, lenders and other creditors in making decisions about providing resources to the reporting entity. According to the European Accounting Association: Relevance Relevance is the capacity of the financial information to influence the decision of its users.

item.title: About
item.description: At wise analytica we translate data to make decisions which help your business and communities to unleash their real potential. We do more than just analytics, we create stability, we find you ideas to improve growth and make decisions which will help you eventually in gaining the real access to your hidden efficiency. We are remote data science and analytics consulting company, started in 2022, and since the creation we are assisting clients from all over the world.
